text: Sir Michael Cathel Fallon KCB MP (born 14 May 1952) is a British Conservative politician and Member of Parliament for Sevenoaks. From 2014 until 2017, he served as Secretary of State for Defence. He was also a member of the National Security Council. He was previously Vice Chairman of the Conservative Party. ==Other websites== *Michael Fallon website *Michael Fallon Fan Club *Debrett's People of Today *Guardian Unlimited Politics – Ask Aristotle: Michael Fallon MP *TheyWorkForYou.com – Michael Fallon MP Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs
title: Michael Fallon
